title: Rito can i please have 16 RP for project lucian ????
body: It's in my personal holiday sales that expires January 9th.  It costs 540 and i have 524!!!  Pls. I drew a picture but idk how to post it fjdklsfjdksfs

replies.body: Hey, I'd love to see the drawing!  You can upload it on a site like [Imgur](https://imgur.com/), and then link it here.  :D  We may be able to help out!

https://imgur.com/gallery/fkzQ2

!!!!!!!!!! made an imgur just for u bb
Ohhh bb, very nice Lucian.  Thanks, you may find some goodies on your account. :D

HEY sorry to bother you again but for some reason when I bought project lucian it didn't take all of my RP and put me back at 526.  I figured I should let you know since I should be at 0 RP after that purchase.

You are quite the honest individual! Kudos to you for being honest (even though it was an inaccurate listing for your RP). Keep up the good work! People like you make reading these forum enjoyable, and restore my faith in humanity!
Heya, it's showing 0 on your account for me.  You may need to relog to resync your balance, let me know!
Relogged and it's displaying correctly now. Thanks!
